org.apache.flink.client

类 RemoteExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.PlanExecutor
      • org.apache.flink.client.RemoteExecutor

  • public class RemoteExecutor
extends PlanExecutor
    The RemoteExecutor is a PlanExecutor that takes the program and ships it to a remote Flink cluster for execution.

    The RemoteExecutor is pointed at the JobManager and gets the program and (if necessary) the set of libraries that need to be shipped together with the program.

    The RemoteExecutor is used in the RemoteEnvironment to remotely execute program parts.

      • setDefaultParallelism

        public void setDefaultParallelism(int defaultParallelism)
        Sets the parallelism that will be used when neither the program does not define any parallelism at all.
        参数:
        defaultParallelism - The default parallelism for the executor.

      • getDefaultParallelism

        public int getDefaultParallelism()
        Gets the parallelism that will be used when neither the program does not define any parallelism at all.
        返回:
        The default parallelism for the executor.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Starts the program executor. After the executor has been started, it will keep running until PlanExecutor.stop() is called.
        指定者:
        start 在类中 PlanExecutor
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the executor startup failed.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Shuts down the plan executor and releases all local resources.

        This method also ends all sessions created by this executor. Remote job executions may complete, but the session is not kept alive after that.

        指定者:
        stop 在类中 PlanExecutor
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the proper shutdown failed.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Checks if this executor is currently running.
        指定者:
        isRunning 在类中 PlanExecutor
        返回:
        True is the executor is running, false otherwise.

      • executePlan

        public JobExecutionResult executePlan(Plan plan)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Execute the given program.

        If the executor has not been started before, then this method will start the executor and stop it after the execution has completed. This implies that one needs to explicitly start the executor for all programs where multiple dataflow parts depend on each other. Otherwise, the previous parts will no longer be available, because the executor immediately shut down after the execution.

        指定者:
        executePlan 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        plan - The plan of the program to execute.
        返回:
        The execution result, containing for example the net runtime of the program, and the accumulators.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if job submission caused an exception.

      • executePlanWithJars

        public JobExecutionResult executePlanWithJars(JobWithJars program)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getOptimizerPlanAsJSON

        public java.lang.String getOptimizerPlanAsJSON(Plan plan)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Gets the programs execution plan in a JSON format.
        指定者:
        getOptimizerPlanAsJSON 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        plan - The program to get the execution plan for.
        返回:
        The execution plan, as a JSON string.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the executor could not connect to the compiler.

      • endSession

        public void endSession(JobID jobID)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Ends the job session, identified by the given JobID. Jobs can be kept around as sessions, if a session timeout is specified. Keeping Jobs as sessions allows users to incrementally add new operations to their dataflow, that refer to previous intermediate results of the dataflow.
        指定者:
        endSession 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        jobID - The JobID identifying the job session.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the message to finish the session cannot be delivered.
